title: Refactor Database Queries
author: Alice Johnson
text: Optimized the SQL queries for user data retrieval to improve performance by 15%.

title: Fix Login Timeout Issue
author: Bob Smith
text: Resolved the session timeout problem by increasing token expiry and adjusting cookie settings.

title: Update API Documentation
author: Charlie Brown
text: Added Swagger documentation for new endpoints introduced in version 2.3.0.

title: Implement Dark Mode Toggle
author: Diana King
text: Integrated a dark mode toggle in the frontend settings using localStorage to persist user preference.

title: Improve CI/CD Pipeline
author: Ethan Clark
text: Enhanced the CI/CD pipeline with automated linting, testing, and deployment triggers on pull requests.

title: Fix Memory Leak in Server
author: Fiona White
text: Identified and patched a memory leak caused by unclosed database connections in the Node.js backend.

title: Enhance Error Logging
author: George Lee
text: Implemented a structured error logging system using Winston for better troubleshooting and tracking.

title: Optimize Image Loading
author: Hannah Kim
text: Improved image loading performance by implementing lazy loading and WebP format conversion.

title: Upgrade Dependencies
author: Isaac Miller
text: Upgraded all project dependencies to the latest stable versions and resolved breaking changes.

title: Add Unit Tests for Utilities
author: Julia Perez
text: Wrote unit tests for core utility functions, achieving 95% test coverage in the utilities module.
